transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji good evening ma'am.
Customer: Ji good evening.
Executive: Wo actually ma'am main baat kar raha hu IndiaMART office se.
Customer: Okay okay ya sir number.
Executive: Haan wo actually aap call actually wo aap call kar rahe the na tab main video meeting pe tha kisi customer ke sath to utha nahi paya to aapne shayad wo customer care pe call kar diya tha.
Customer: Haan sir ye bol rahe the sir wo pressurize kiye ki sir phone nahi tha customer ko.
Executive: Kaha?
Customer: Sir hai ki sir lead aa rahi hai but lead ho raha hai 100% sure nahi ho pa raha hai.
Executive: Matlab kya issue aa raha hai ma'am?
Customer: Sir purchase nahi ho pa raha hai jaise aise hi check kiye hain IndiaMART dekh rahe the bas kya theek thaak kar diya to ye sab lead ke liye nahi sir ghar ka khane ka matlab hai ki hum amount lagaye to ye sab lead ke liye nahi na lagaye jo 100% sure lead hai lead wo humko dijiye aur.
Executive: Accha dekho ma'am aapko na thoda sa dekho main aapko thoda sa batata hu jaise aapne jo mujhe pizza oven wo bakery oven wale product the na ma'am wo to maine catalog ke upar live kar diye the. Theek hai? To abhi kya tha you know jaise matlab aapko na main aapko thoda sa rai dunga kyuki aapka jo area hai wo shayad aap Bihar hi area deal karte hai zyada zyada karo to Jharkhand right ma'am?
Customer: No sir Bihar ka karna hai.
Executive: Haan haan Bihar ka. To uske liye na thoda sa thoda sa main aapko ye idea dunga kyuki dekhiye ma'am Bihar pe kya hai thoda sa na uske liye aapko prime focus karke rakhna padega. In the focus in the sense jaise jo leads aa rahi hai aapko timely consume karne ki kyuki aapko pata hai na humne ab ek lead paanch logo ko dena start kiya hai. To jaise hi koi ek lead paanch log consume kar lete hai to unke paas paanch quotation ja chuki hoti hai aur kabhi kabhi kya hota hai client ek call mein hi deal convert kar jata hai kisi kisi ke sath. To jab tak wo aap call le rahe ho to shayad wo call entertain kare hi na customer. To isiliye kabhi kabhi aapse wo bolte honge ki hum to le chuke hain ya hum to bas dekh rahe the check kar rahe the. To ye aapke paas challenge aata hoga to main aapko ek rai ye dunga ki na aap na ek proper excel maintain karo ma'am. Theek hai? Excel maintain mein kya hai jaise for example aaj hamari tarikh ho gayi 17 tarikh ho gayi. Theek hai? To 17 tarikh ko kitne customero ko aapne reach kiya to aap kya karo serial number, client ka naam, client ka number, client ki email id, client ka address aur client ne kya product manga ye paanch cheez pehle aap excel mein aata hai to excel chalana aata hai to well and good hai nahi aata to copy notepad mein utar lo.
Customer: Sir hum waise hi karte hain sara note karte hain.
Executive: Haan haan to usse kya hoga note karte hain unse kya baat hui hai fir wo kal kya baat karte hain.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Bilkul bilkul aur usme na fir aapko kya hoga agar excel chalana aata hai usme color combination hote hai yellow, green aur red aur orange char color rakh lo. Ek dekho red mane dead case matlab bilkul not interested case hai usko aap dead karke khatam kar do ki wo not interested bol chuka hai to hame wo kisi kaam ka nahi hai. Theek hai? To aap usko to red kar dena jo deal done ho jati hai unko green color kar do aur jo orange color hai us pe aap negotiation dal do aur jo yellow color hai abhi usko proposal ya quotation tak baat hui hai bas aise matlab follow up ho raha hai bas ye cheez. To char color aap yaad rakhoge na to aapko ye pata chalega ki one month one week ke andar mere ko jo 44 leads milti hai aur main 44 customero se agar main reach karti hu to mujhe kitne customero ka feedback ka result accha nikal ke aaya hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To ye agar aap karoge na ma'am dekhna aapko thoda sa help ho jayegi aur dusri cheez kya hai aapke paas direct inquiry ka bhi flow hai buylead alag cheez hai inquiry alag cheez hai aur jo catalog dekhte hai wo alag cheez hai aur jo call aa rahi hai wo to aapko attend aur aapke sir ke number pe attend karni hai. To ye char method hai agar in charo ko aap fulfill karoge na ma'am ek conversion to koi bhi nikal payega easily. Haan thoda ye rehta hai.
Customer: Yahi sir hai ki sir itna hone ke baad bhi ho gaya na ki tarikh ko active hua hai lekin ka customer se bhi deal nahi hua hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To main to yahi rai dunga thoda sa na bas dekho jahan faste ho zyada lage to aap mujhe connect kara diya karo main itna help kar sakta hu kyuki mujhe Prashant ne bhi bola tha ki ma'am ko thoda sa help karte rehna to ma'am ko agar accha business milega aage definitely ma'am star pe bhi ja sakti hai to mujhe to pata hai ki main aapko accha business dilwaunga to aage aap bade plan pe bhi pahuch jaoge. To wahi hai thoda sa na ma'am main to rai dunga aapko jahan faso aap mujhe connect karwa diya karo customer ko hum dono call call leke call close karne ki koshish karenge deal ko. Waise to hamare yaha allow nahi hai but fir bhi jaise kya hai ki na aapko koi help chahiye to hum definitely ma'am help karne.
Customer: Customer se to main deal kar leti hu by the way lead sir interested rahe to na jaise customer interested rahe to na.
Executive: Accha accha.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Nahi koi nahi aap wo jahan jahan fasa karo aapne mujhe wo pizza oven wale hai maine wo bhi product aapke live kar diye aapne agar check kiya ho profile pe laptop pe agar baith ke dekha ho.
Customer: Rate aap uska dale hain rate to nahi dale hain.
Executive: Rate to maine nahi rate maine abhi competitor ke dekhe sabne 1.5 lakh kisi ne 4 lakh dal rakhe the to maine abhi temporary basis pe bola gaya.
Customer: Main dal dungi.
Executive: Nahi aap usko edit kar sakte ho actually main yahi batane ke liye kar raha tha kyuki na khali nahi chhod sakte hamare yaha bola hai koi koi product ki photo aur product ka price ke bina agar tum live kar rahe ho to client ka koi bhala nahi hoga isse client ka nuksan hi hai to isliye hum wo cheez galat nahi kar sakte na to maine abhi temporary basis pe price dal diye to yahi cheez main aapko bolne bhi wala tha ek bar aap price and wo sab dekh lena to wo bhi hum theek kar denge agar aap bologe to main kar dunga nahi to aap bhi kar sakte ho ye to.
Customer: Sir uska price main dal dungi.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji aur aap kal hum ek video meet kar lete hai agar aapko thoda challenge aa raha hai to hum ek do customero ko morning mein connect karke dekhte hai kya dikkat aa rahi hai kya problem aa rahi hai ye hum kar sakte hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hai na aur baki ma'am abhi aapne jaise customer care pe call kiya tha to wo concern main close kar du?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Haan aapko na koi bhi issue aaya kare wo mera personal number jo aap pehle call kar rahe the wo bilkul wahi number pe aapko call karna hai. Theek hai wo actually main video meet pe tha main soch raha tha conversation chal raha tha.
Customer: Sir mujhe message kar diya kijiye mujhe message kar diya kijiye.
Executive: Haan wo main karne hi wala tha isliye main aapka dusre number pe aa gaya. Wo main nahi wo sir upar se pressure de wo bole nahi aap kijiye call kijiye isliye hum aise kahin na kahin busy ho.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haan ji haan ji nahi nahi. Sir ko screenshot bhej dungi na to wo thoda doubt clear ho jayega unko laga ki main call hi nahi kar rahi hu.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Accha accha accha accha nahi koi nahi aap tension na lo main kal ek bar aapko connect bhi kar lunga aur ma'am ye jo primary mail id hai Niranjan pe update hai wo aapke paas uska access hai?
Customer: Matlab sir?
Executive: Jo mail id aapke Niranjan pe hai uska access aapke paas hai mail ka?
Customer: Haan haan hai mere paas.
Executive: To actually main concern jab yaha se close karunga na to ma'am yaha pe na aapke paas ek feedback ka jayega to aap usme ma'am please.
Customer: Theek theek main kar dungi.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji aapko pata hai na na?
Customer: Yes sir ki kar chuke hain.
Executive: Accha accha theek hai theek hai nahi main concern close karunga fir main aapko message karunga aap usme fir reply de dena aap theek hai ma'am.
Customer: Theek theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am thank you ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are not converting into purchases.

- Feels pressured to make calls.



Resolution:

- Executive provided tips for lead management.

- Executive offered to assist with customer calls.

- Executive will connect with customer tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to update product prices.

- Executive to connect with customer tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, follow up, excel
